snippet.title: Fera: The Sundered Tribes Early Access Launch Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
An exclusive dev commentary video for Massive Damage's ambitious hybrid of monster hunting, village building and tribe management, produced exclusively for the Convergence Games Showcase. Experience groundbreaking aerial traversal and combat mechanics.

Available in Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2469200

#convergenceshow #indiegame
